title: Environmental Engr Sys
description: Environmental engineering issues associated with water, air, and land pollution, including risk assessment, groundwater contamination, global climate change, and sustainable technologies.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: (CHEM 1310 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 1211K Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or CHEM 12X1 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T) and (PHYS 2211 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or PHYS 2231 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D) and (MATH 1502 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1512 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 15X2 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T or MATH 1552 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 1X52 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of T)
